Title: Making $10,000,000 and I’m Completely Stressed Out
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A young owner looking for help establishing processes in his fast- growing business 
  • A woman looking to fire an employee who won’t see it coming 
  • Dave Ramsey’s take on Home Depot requiring corporate employees to work in retail stores 
  • A business owner looking for advice on profit sharing with her team
